This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $11000. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a limited-time guarantee of 30 days for any issues or concerns. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours today. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
